summary: When Apollo astronaut Gene Cernan stepped off the moon in December 1972 he left his footprints and his daughter's initials in the lunar dust. Only now is he ready to share his epic but deeply personal story of fulfillment, love, and loss.
cast: Eugene Cernan|Fred 'Baldy' Baldwin|Alan Bean|Barbara Butler|Jan Nanna Cernan|Tracy Cernan|Martha Chaffee|Roger B. Chaffee|Charles Duke|Richard Gordon|Claire Johnson|Christopher Kraft|Gene Kranz|Jim Lovell|Thomas P. Stafford|Edward H. White II|Yuri Gagarin|Gus Grissom|John F. Kennedy|Nikita Khrushchev|Harrison Schmitt
title: The Last Man on the Moon
